coreAttributes.name: triple cuff choker necklace
coreAttributes.description: Three solid bands of metal, each of which with a gap at the back, allowing them to be fitted onto someone's neck. Two of the bands are smaller than the third, which sports an additional decorative orb of metal.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] securely [npc.verb(slot)] the three cuff choker necklaces around [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] securely [npc.verb(slot)] the three cuff choker necklaces around [npc2.namePos] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before forcing the three cuff choker necklaces around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] three cuff choker necklaces off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] three cuff choker necklaces off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] three cuff choker necklaces off from around [npc2.her] neck.
